attributes.action: Gooseacre Lane Double Yellow Parking Constant Violation
attributes.additional_details:
The council have placed double yellow lines on the junction of Gooseacre Lane and Kenton Road to prevent cars from parking, and blocking, this junction.

Cars continue to park here creating a bottleneck for cars turning into Gooseacre Lane from Kenton Road.

This is not monitored and should have cameras placed here with fines or violation notices, or constant monitoring of this area via parking attendants or mobile CCTV vans.

This is a constant and regular issue resulting in violators becoming aggressive and violent on confrontation by the public.
